body.name: Premium Smartphone Holder/Vertical and Horizontal Tripod Mount Adapter Rotatable Bracket with 1/4 inch Screw/Adjustable Clip for iPhone, Android Cell Phone, Selfie Stick, Camera Stand
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 2 mins
FREE pickup Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest Same-Day pickup Today 10 AM - 3 PM. Order within 4 hrs 47 mins
features: FEATURE: the tripod phone mount is adjustable by screw mechanism, 360 degree rotating, vertical(portrait mode) and horizontal(landscape mode) or any angle as you need, not necessary to take your cell phone out of a standard tripod or small tripod.

EASY TO USE: two options for using tripod phone holder: 1. screw it directly to the tripod or selfie stick with pivoting arm, being able to 360 degrees rotating, 2. remove the phone clamp from pivoting arm and then mount on a tripod or monopod.

ADJUSTABLE WIDTH: 2.2inch-4.1inch(55mm-105mm), attachable to any regular-size smartphone, tripod, selfie stick, monopod or camera; two standard 1/4 x 20mm female thread interfaces meeting your various needs. Very functional and compact.

MATERIAL: the black part made of sturdy plastic, the female threads inserted are brass, the male screw is steel and soft non-slipping silica gel pads, which protect your cellphone from scratch and hold the phone securely.

ATTACHABLE TO: most mobile phones, tripods, unipods, selfie sticks, cameras, camcorders, pico projectors, including iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/X/XS/XR/XS Max/8/7/6/6s Plus/SE/5s/5/5c, Samsung Galaxy S10/10+/S9/S9+/S8/S8+/S7/S6/S6 edge, Note10/10+/9/8 and Android phones.
body.description: SharingMoment Brand phone holder for tripod aims to free up your hands and make you more comfortable when using imaging or video devices. Better products and better user experience push us to be better together. Specification: -- smartphone tripod mount: adjustable size of cell phone clamp: 2.2inch-4.1inch(55mm-105mm) size: 12.3cm*5cm*3.3cm, weight: 75.5g The smartphone holder is 360 degree rotating, portrait mode (vertical) or landscape mode (horizontal) chosen as you prefer, not necessary to take your phone out of the tripod or selfie stick, very functional and easy to use. Two options for using the tripod mount phone holder: 1. screw it directly to the tripod with pivoting arm, being able to 360 degrees rotating; 2. remove the clamp from pivoting arm and then mount on a tripod or monopod. Adjustable width from 5.5cm to 10.5cm, attachable to any regular-size cell phone, tripod, monopod or camera; Two standard 1/4" screw thread interfaces meet your various needs. Small and compact enough to fit it in your pocket. Packing details: --one piece of phone mount for tripod. Standard packaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy to attach to both your phone and tripod - this holder works great!
reviews.reviewText: Used this for family holiday pictures switching from our old standard digital camera to utilizing anyone's phone that was handy. The holder was easy to use - held the phone firmly and steady. A great attachment for our tripod so everyone is in the picture and proportional. Much better than arm length selfies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good fit for my phone
reviews.reviewText: Fits the phone very well. Durability is still unknown, but it feels durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No instructions on how to use it. I figured it out but it took a while.
reviews.reviewText: Works well.I can't testify to how durable it will be. Time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and affordable
reviews.reviewText: This product is very simple but effective for a very affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to attach my cell to the dash of my beater. I screwed it to the dash with a sheet rock screw and added a rubber washer between the device and the dash. It's a hillbilly dashcam. If I had another cell, I'd take a picture of it.Alas.It's very sturdy and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a phone perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Threaded right on and holds the fone tight and solidly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Worth The Money!
reviews.reviewText: These are well worth the money, they held the phones plenty steady and secure on the tripod! I had zero worries or concerns the phones would fall off!I had one phone nearly 20ft up on a custom tripod with an extension and had no concerns or worries it was going to fall off or need adjustment once it was secured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use, Fit Perfectly
reviews.reviewText: My parents kept trying to balance their phone on their old camera tripod using stuff around their house and I finally bought one of these for them to make it easier on them. It's great, works great, easy to use, fit no problem.

Always propping my phone on rocks or gloves or you-name-it, this item screws into any threaded tripod mount and eliminates hassle. Love this thing. Super light, small and strong enough to withstand frequent use. No complaints so far.
Well priced relative to other products available. Simple product that does the job well. Arrived on time.

it tightens perfectly to fit phone and you can adjust the angle with the knob easily. plastic is pretty strong with metal interior components. 10 times better than the standard cheap clip on phone holder

For a product with such high ratings the quality is very poor. Almost all plastic, flimsy and feels like it would break very easily. Would not trust this to hold a phone so I’ve returned it. Also the plastic has a strong odor and some flashing from the casting process. Sadly 1 star for this ‘Amazon’s choice’
For the price you can't go wrong. It's good and sturdy.
